Vertical fiber system neuron.SuperCategory: Small field neuron of the central complex
Vertical fiber system neuron.Comment: Not to be confused with the vertical system (VS) neurons of the lobula plate (FBbt_00007516).
Vertical fiber system neuron.Definition: Small field neuron of the central complex that arborizes in a single glomerulus of the protocerebral bridge, layer one or two of the fan-shaped body and the contralateral nodulus. Fibers of two adjacent glomeruli join into bundles that run ipsilaterally to the fan-shaped body and enter it in the fourth layer without crossing each other.
